member.name: IDWriteBitmapRenderTarget1.GetTextAntialiasMode
member.summary: Gets the current text antialiasing mode of the bitmap render target.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the antialiasing mode.

member.name: IDWriteBitmapRenderTarget1.SetTextAntialiasMode
member.summary: Sets the current text antialiasing mode of the bitmap render target.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the antialiasing mode.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or E_INVALIDARG if the argument is not valid.

member.name: IDWriteBitmapRenderTarget1
member.summary: Encapsulates a 32-bit device independent bitmap and device context, which you can use for rendering glyphs.
